  • Mar 16, 2012

    YHA here we come

    We've joined the Youth Hostel Association and are planning some trips over the Easter Holiday. We're off to a Bristol and then off to the Brecons to see some mountains. Pretty cheap accommodation and nice locations - feeling quite excited about it already.

  • Mar 16, 2012

    Visit to Historic Dockyards

    We visited HMS Warrior (first Ironclad ship in Navy), Action Stations and enjoyed a nice boat ride around the harbour.

  • Mar 16, 2012

    It was really cold this afternoon walking around the forest - the boys really enjoyed skating around on thin ice.
